entry.title: New release for Bazarr: v1.5.1
entry.content: From newest to oldest: - Improved languages profile health check to include default assigned profiles 0413dba - Fixed sync issue with Radarr that would remove all movies from database on every sync. 60febe3 - Added check to opensubtitles.com for SDH subtitles being classified as forced 4809b40 - Fixed Bazarr not starting when configured IP isn't available for binding. b71daad - Improved Sonarr and Radarr syncing to prevent database integrity exception being raised by relying on proper primary keys instead of other values. 8346ea9 - Added opensubtitles specific throttling for server under maintenance (http 506) 2247c55
